zh: 使攻擊目標擊飛到最遠，對撞到的人造成傷害
en: Repel the victim as far as possible, causing damage to those it hits.

zh: 把攻擊目標的方向改變
en: Change the direction of the victim

zh: 攻击目標沒法移動1回合
en: The victim cannot move for 1 round

zh: 放置後每一回合增加1傷害
en: Increases damage by 1 each round after placement
Change places with the person in front of cell
